scan_table_check.description: OOTB there is no strict rule how to mark a user as a technical user. This may lead to confusion which users actually are technical users and which are not. This may then lead to security issues and increase the risk of security incidents. Maintaining access to the platform starts with determining real users from technical users by applying a strict naming convention. Such a naming convention is described in the whitepaper "A mature development and deploment process".
scan_table_check.name: DataSanity - Invalid technical users
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Rename and/or set the required flags to match the naming convention described in the whitepaper. This may include changing existing OOTB users.
scan_table_check.short_description: Technical users must follow the naming convention.
